Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Aaronode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Nee Vilakkugalai Etrumbodhu Ezhu Vilakkugalum Vilakkuththandirku Nere Eriyavendum Endru Sol Endraar.
3 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapragaaram Aaron Seydhu, Vilakkuththandirku Nere Ozhungaaga Adhin Vilakkugalai Etrinaan.
4 indhak Kuththuvilakku, Adhin Paadhamudhal Pookkalvaraikkum Ponninaal Adippuvelaiyaai Seyyappattirundhadhu; Karththar Mosekkuk Kaanbiththa Maadhiriyinpadiye Avan Kuththuvilakkai Undaakkinaan.
5 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
6 nee Isravel Sandhadhiyaarinindru Leviyaraip Piriththeduththu, Avargalai Suththigarippaayaaga.

7 avargalai Suththirikkumpadi Avargalukku Seyyavendiyadhaavadhu: Avargalmel Suththigarikkum Jalaththaith Thelippaayaaga; Pinbu Avargal Sarvaanga Savarampanni Thangal Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thangalai Suththigarikkakkadavargal.
8 appozhudhu Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Adharketra Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavaagiya Pojanapaliyaiyum Konduvarakkadavargal; Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Veroru Kaalaiyaiyum Nee Vaangi,
9 leviyarai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkumun Varachcheydhu, Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Koodivarappannuvaayaaga.
10 nee Leviyaraik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Varappanninapodhu, Isravel Puththirar Thangal Kaigalai Leviyarmel Vaikkakkadavargal.
11 leviyar Karththarukkuriya Panividai Seyyumporuttu, Aaron Avargalai Isravel Puththirarin Kaanikkaiyaagak Karththarukku Munbaaga Asaivaattappadum Kaanikkaiyaai Niruththakkadavan.

12 adhanpin Leviyar Thangal Kaigalaik Kaalaigaludaiya Thalaiyinmel Vaippaargalaaga; Pinbu Nee Leviyarukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumporuttu,karththarukku Avaigalil Ondraip Paavanivaarana Paliyaagavum, Matrondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum Seluththi,
13 leviyarai Aaronukkum Avan Kumaaranukkum Munbaaga Niruththi, Avargalaik Karththarukku Asaivaattappadum Kaanikkaiyaakki,
14 ippadi Nee Leviyarai Isravel Puththirarilirundhu Piriththedukkakkadavaai; Leviyar Ennudaiyavargalaayiruppaargal.
15 ippadi Avargalai Suththigariththu, Avargalai Asaivaattum Kaanikkaiyaakkakkadavaai; Adhanpinbu Leviyar Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Panividai Seyyap Pravesikkakkadavargal.

16 isravel Puththirarilirundhu Avargal Enakku Mutrilum Kodukkappattirukkiraargal; Isravel Puththirar Ellaarilum Garppandhirandhu Pirakkira Sagala Mudharperukkum Badhilaaga Avargalai Enakku Eduththukkonden.

17 isravel Puththiraril Manidharilum Mirugajeevangalilum Mudharperaanadhellaam Ennudaiyadhu; Naan Egipthudhesaththile Mudharperaana Yaavaiyum Sangariththa Naalile Avaigalai Enakkendru Parisuththappaduththi,
18 pinbu Leviyarai Isravel Puththirarilulla Mudharperu Sagalaththirkum Badhilaaga Eduththukkondu,

19 leviyar Isravel Puththirarudaiya Panividaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Seyyumpadikkum, Isravel Puththirarukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadikkum, Isravel Puththirar Thaangale Parisuththa Sthalaththil Serugiradhinaal Isravel Puththiraril Vaadhaiyundaagaadhapadikkum, Leviyarai Avargalilirundhu Eduththu, Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Thaththamaagak Koduththen Endraar.
20 appozhudhu Moseyum Aaronum Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyaar Yaavarum Karththar Leviyaraikkuriththu Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Leviyarukku Seydhaargal.

21 leviyar Suththigarikkappattu, Thangal Vasthirangalaith Thoiththaargal; Pinbu Aaron Avargalaik Karththarukku Munbaaga Asaivaattum Kaanikkaiyaaga Niruththi, Avargalai Suththigarikka Avargalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seydhaan.

22 adharkuppinbu Leviyar Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Munbaaga Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Thangal Panividaiyai Seyyumpadi Pravesiththaargal; Karththar Leviyaraikkuriththu Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Avargalukku Seydhaargal.
23 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
24 leviyarukkuriya Kattalai Ennavendraal: Irubaththaindhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Yaavarum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Panividaiyai Seyyum Senaiyile Sevikka Varavendum.
25 aimbadhu Vayadhukku Merpattavargal Velaiseyyaamal Thiruppani Senaiyai Vittu,

26 aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Kaavalaik Kaakkiradharkuth Thangal Sagodhararode Oozhiyancheyvadheyandri, Veroru Sevagamum Seyyavendiyadhillai; Ippadi Leviyar Seyyavendiya Velaigalaikkuriththuth Thittampannakkadavaai Endraar.
